definition: Hongwei district of Liaoyang city 遼陽市|辽阳市[Liao2 yang2 shi4], Liaoning

sentences.english: But Professor Harrison said that the SPP has far more ambitious goals.
sentences.chinese: 但哈里森教授表示，SPP的目標要宏偉得多。

sentences.english: The dinner took place at the Hotel Majestic, 19 Avenue Kléber, in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 晚宴在巴黎克萊貝爾大道19號的宏偉酒店內舉行。

sentences.english: You've only seen some of the great Blood Elf architecture with Silvermoon City.
sentences.chinese: 你已經在銀月城看見一些血精靈的宏偉建築了。

sentences.english: The magnificent Ming and Qing palaces' pillars are red and the tiles are yellow.
sentences.chinese: 這座宏偉的明，清時代的宮殿是紅柱黃瓦。

sentences.english: No words can express the grandeur of that parade.
sentences.chinese: 閱兵式那宏偉的場面是無法用語言來表達的。

sentences.english: Tall, project of the grand, in the Heze area come first on the list.
sentences.chinese: 高大，工程之宏偉，在菏澤地區首屈一指。

sentences.english: The rise of the redback will be a super, true story.
sentences.chinese: 人民幣崛起的影響力將是宏偉而真實的故事。

sentences.english: She is a questionnaireidcompletely remarketing cihampaigny country.
Not quite as magnificent without my grandfather's special touch.
sentences.chinese: 沒有祖父特別的照料，鍾都沒以前那麼宏偉了。

sentences.english: One ambitious goal of the foundation is to wipe polio off the face of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 基金會的另一宏偉目標是讓脊髓灰質炎在地球上消失。

sentences.english: The northern ice cap on Mars is nearly divided into two by a huge division named Chasma Boreale.
sentences.chinese: 火星北半球的冰冠幾乎被宏偉的博勒拉峽谷一劈爲二。

sentences.english: Based on the huge dome and the crescent sign, I guess it must be an Islamic structure.
sentences.chinese: 宏偉的穹頂，彎彎的新月，一看就知道是伊斯蘭建築。

sentences.english: Oxford Landing was established in 1958 on the bands of the majestic murray river in south Australia.
sentences.chinese: 牛津園於1958年在南澳宏偉的墨累河岸推出。

sentences.english: The Chinese tourist has become a ubiquitous sight from the Grand Canyon to the Grand Palais.
sentences.chinese: 從壯美的峽谷到宏偉的宮殿，中國到處都是旅遊景點。

sentences.english: In the grand scheme, do I really need these things?
sentences.chinese: 在這個宏偉的計劃中，我真的確是需要這些東西嗎？

sentences.english: Monument up to two meters, matched with the main hall under the copper top, magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 兩碑高達五米，與大殿銅頂上下相映，宏偉壯觀。

definition: gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
